(b) Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="x equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Use the Lagrange error bound to show that the approximation from part (c) differs from the actual value of <math alttext="f of 2.4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2.4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> by less than <math alttext="0.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
